fields.name: account_type
fields.description: Type of the account (e.g., checking, savings)

fields.name: logo_path
fields.description: Path to the Chase bank logo

fields.name: statement_period
fields.description: The period covered by the statement (e.g., January 1 - February 28)

fields.name: account_number
fields.description: Unique identifier for the Chase account

fields.name: account_holder
fields.description: Name of the account holder

fields.name: account_holder_address
fields.description: Address of the account holder

fields.name: summary.beginning_balance
fields.description: Balance at the start of the statement period

fields.name: summary.deposits_count
fields.description: Number of deposits made during the statement period

fields.name: summary.deposits_total
fields.description: Total amount deposited during the statement period

fields.name: summary.withdrawals_count
fields.description: Number of withdrawals made during the statement period

fields.name: summary.withdrawals_total
fields.description: Total amount withdrawn during the statement period

fields.name: summary.transactions_count
fields.description: Total number of transactions made during the statement period

fields.name: summary.ending_balance
fields.description: Balance at the end of the statement period

fields.name: transaction.date
fields.description: Date of each transaction

fields.name: transaction.description
fields.description: Description or purpose of each transaction

fields.name: transaction.amount
fields.description: Amount of each transaction

fields.name: summary.deposits_total
fields.description: Total amount deposited during the statement period (duplicate)

fields.name: transaction.date
fields.description: Date of each transaction (duplicate)

fields.name: transaction.description
fields.description: Description or purpose of each transaction (duplicate)

fields.name: transaction.amount
fields.description: Amount of each transaction (duplicate)

fields.name: summary.withdrawals_total
fields.description: Total amount withdrawn during the statement period (duplicate)

fields.name: balance.date
fields.description: Date of the balance inquiry

fields.name: balance.amount
fields.description: Balance at the time of the balance inquiry
